channel.title: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog (Video)
channel.itunes:summary: Join our vlog hosts as they share their real-life parenting experiences. This video series of short, five minute episodes seeks to offer words of inspiration for child-rearing from an Orthodox Christian perspective.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sharing real-life parenting experiences
channel.itunes:author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog, and Ancient Faith Ministries

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog, and Ancient Faith Ministries

item.title: Great Lent
item.description:
Have you had big dreams for your kids during Great Lent? Do you feel like you’re not reaching your children--that they aren’t partaking in all the beauty of Great Lent the way you’d like them to?
Grab an afternoon cup of something and join Kerri while she shares her real-life parenting experiences.
item.author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog
item.itunes:subtitle:

item.title: Namedays
item.description:
How do you celebrate your patron saint feast days? Cake? Liturgy? Do you celebrate with family and friends?
Grab an afternoon cup of something and join Kerri while she shares her real-life parenting experiences.
item.author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog
item.itunes:subtitle:

item.title: Visiting Monasteries
item.description:
Does taking small children to monasteries seem like more of a chore than a grace? Kerri shares how her family approaches a monastery visit and recommends that you give it a try!
Grab an afternoon cup of something and join Kerri while she shares her real-life parenting experiences.
item.author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog

item.title: St. Luke's Heart
item.description: Sometimes saints other than our patrons make their way into our lives. Kerri shares how St. Luke the Surgeon has become an important intercessor and member of her family.
item.author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog
item.itunes:subtitle: Sometimes saints other than our patrons make their way into our lives. Kerri shares how St. Luke the Surgeon has become an important intercessor and member of her family.
item.author: Ancient Faith Kids Vlog
item.itunes:summary: Sometimes saints other than our patrons make their way into our lives. Kerri shares how St. Luke the Surgeon has become an important intercessor and member of her family.

item.title: Forty Days
item.description:
How do you feel about the 40-day tradition in the Orthodox Church, where the mother stays home after the birth of a new baby? Presvytera Kerri shares her thoughts, and how her mind has changed about this topic over the years.
Grab an afternoon cup of something and join Kerri while she shares her real-life parenting experiences.

item.title: Children in Church
item.description: Do you ever feel llike you spend more time in the narthex than in the nave! Presvytera Kerri talks about some wise advice she received while at liturgy from a lovely Greek grandma. Advice that changed her approach and expectations of her children in church.
